statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{20 \, x^{3} + 24 \, x^{2} + 12 \, x + 8 , -2 \, x^{3} - 18 \, x + 4 , -5 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x - 2 , -x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 2 , 10 \, x^{3} + 16 \, x^{2} - 22 \, x + 12\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
